Package wiffleballScorekeeper.menu

package wiffleballScorekeeper.menu
This package contains the classes used to create all of the menus for the Wiffleball Scorekeeper app. It contains an abstract base class Menu that is used for all menus of the application. This base class also contains some static methods useful for working with the console.
Author:
Corbyn Coffin
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    wiffleballScorekeeper
    This package contains a collection of classes used to produce an implementation of an app that functions as a scorekeeper for a game of wiffleball.
    wiffleballScorekeeper.game
    This package contains the classes necessary to fully represent a game of wiffleball.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameMenus
    This GameMenu class is a collection of Menu's used to control an instance of the Game class.
    MainMenu
    This MainMenu class is used to control an instance of the main WiffleballScorekeeper class.
    Menu
    Abstract base class used for all menus in the app.
